message.content:
cs.DC, cs.MS, cs.NA, cs.SC, cs.SY 

Reasoning: 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) is the most likely category as the paper presents a new method for performing global redistributions of multidimensional arrays essential to parallel fast Fourier (or similar) transforms. 
- cs.MS (Mathematical Software) is also likely as the paper discusses the performance of well-established libraries like MPI-FFTW, P3DFFT, and 2DECOMP&FFT. 
- cs.NA (Numerical Analysis) is another possible category as the paper deals with numerical computations of fast Fourier transforms. 
- cs.SC (Symbolic Computation) is less likely but still possible as the paper discusses the use of subarray datatypes and generalized all-to-all scatter/gather from the MPI-2 standard. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control) is also less likely but possible as the paper discusses the implementation of compact routines using the MPI bindings for the C programming language.
